nodes.text: The Gungan Scout Camp was located on the Western Great Grass Plains of Naboo, near the planet's capital city Theed. Composed of several tents, the small camp was used by Gungan scouts in around 1 ABY.

At the time, the mercenary Broma Lak of the Azure Cabal sent a spacer to this camp to recover an old satchel. The satchel had last been seen during the Battle of Naboo and had now been spotted in the possession of a devious-looking Ankura Gungan. The spacer attacked the Ankura and killed him to acquire information about the satchel's whereabouts.

The Gungan Scout Camp appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to the Galaxies's closure on December 15, 2011.
